title: windows 10 anniversary update causing bug splat -updated
body:
* Im seeing this alot on the boards now, so im assuming i would probably need to run repairs on the game? Otherwise is this now a compatibility issue with windows 10? 

PS. i've also heard this anniversary update is pretty poopy

-updated- tried ot repair my game and i still get a bugsplat

replies.body:
i finaly fixed it !!!!
i hope this works for you guys
-type "xbox" in your windows search
-click on it and sign up if you have to
-when you are in the xbox app click on the settings (the gear thingy) in the app
-go to dvr games
-disable the dvr recording thing
after that just go in to a custom game and try if it works
seems like after the windows update the recording dvr thing was automaticly on and messed up with league files or something
hope i was helpful :)
Thank you my friend it really helped :D Ireccomend that methode to you all guys :D Thank you again man :D

Thanks. Was tearing out my "hair" trying to figure this one out. Was working fine this morning. Then I take my PC to my mates house and it stopped working.

This could be for a few reasons like an issue with the Windows update, outdated drivers, or corrupted game files.  As a first step, please go through our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to get you back in game.  This should get you fixed up, but let me know if you have issues afterwards!
